answers.answer: Hi,This could be due to the operation, nerve damage, due to infection - gonorrhoea, chlamydia etc, diabetes or kidney stones.You should consult your doctor to rule out the above causes and find out the further management plan in your case.Regards.

question: My penis is cold and numb on the shaft mostly on the left side. Same thing with my testicles it's cold and numb mostly on the left side. I think I have necrosis in the tissue as my penis is too damaged. There isn't enough science or good enough medicine to help me instead of slicing it off.
title: Cold numb penis and testicles
